author: butta
content:
You can now broadcast your BLS change request on zhejiang via https://zhejiang.beaconcha.in/tools/broadcast
(Only broadcast signatures for now, but exits will be added shortly)

author: ralexstokes
content:
i'm seeing a discrepancy b/t the execution payload block hash value on the explorer and what i'm seeing locally w/ my node

the rest of the fields on the explorer match and i'm not sure where the reported block hash is coming from

author: ralexstokes
content:
```
> eth.getBlock(102908)
{
  baseFeePerGas: 7,
  difficulty: 0,
  extraData: "0x",
  gasLimit: 30000000,
  gasUsed: 0,
  hash: "0xd5c0ee39e261e14806e8237b8f2120bf198238c776fb16c606ae7341d29fb955",
```

author: butta
content:
Okay, seems unreated to the broadcasting feature, right?
Noted the bug <:check:1012093720251875418>

author: ralexstokes
content: yeah sorry just wanted to get your attention

author: qu0b
content: does this happen for every block or is it just this one block?

author: ralexstokes
content: every block i have looked at

author: butta
content: as a workaround you can find the correct block with the hash in the url , like <https://zhejiang.beaconcha.in/block/0xd5c0ee39e261e14806e8237b8f2120bf198238c776fb16c606ae7341d29fb955>

author: butta
content: which will point you to 102908 for now

author: sanjayy1702
content: Hi <@412614104222531604> <@539495253418180618>, let's say i make a first deposit of 4ETH for my validator, is it right to say that any balance below 16ETH will automatically be pushed to eth1 address or do i have to broadcast volunteer exit message

author: barnabasbusa
content: No. You will have to activate (32ETH) the validator before it can do anything.

author: butta
content: fixed. Should work fine for new/upcoming blocks ðŸ™‚

author: butta
content: for old blocks we'd need to re-export everything.
